controller

Class FunnoteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FunnoteController

  • public class FunnoteController
extends java.lang.Object
    The FunnoteController connects with the model and view and deals with all the logic relating to saving and creating new pages, sections, and notebooks
    Author:
    Scott LaFerriere, Trevor Freudig, Michael Tuohy, Alex Thompson
